storage: Internal memory (approx. 25 MB)  SD / SDHC / SDXC(UHS-I) memory card*2
zoom: Intelligent digital zoom approx. 2x (up to 8 x when combined with optical zoom)
weight: Approx. 225 g / 7.9 oz. (including battery and memory card)
ccd: 2/3-inch EXR CMOS with primary color filter
exposuresystem: Programmed AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Priority AE, Manual
shutterspeed: (Auto mode) 1/4 sec. to 1/2000* sec., (All other modes) 30 sec. to 1/2000* sec.
